class.name: Slider
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: This class wraps the JQuery UI Slider Component

constructor.param: style data to pass to the slider

class.property: The minimum value of the slider
The maximum value of the slider

event.name: onChange

param.name: value
param.description: The current value of the slider

event.description: Fires when the value of the slider changes

event.name: onSlide

param.name: value
param.description: The current value of the slider

event.description: Fires as the thumb of the slider is moved

method.name: getMax
method.return: The maximum value the slider can be set to

method.name: getMin
method.return: The minimum value the slider can be set to

method.name: getOrientation
method.return: The orientation of the slider; either horizontal or vertical

method.name: getIsRange
method.return: Is the slider a range slider?

method.name: getStep
method.return: The value of each interval or step that the slider takes between min and max

method.name: setStep
method.param: The value of each interval or step that the slider takes between min and max

method.name: getValue
method.return: The current value represented by the slider

method.name: setValue
method.param: The current value represented by the slider

method.name: getValues
method.return: The current values represented by the range slider

method.name: setValues
method.param: The lower value of the range slider
The upper value of the range slider
